import { motion } from "framer-motion"; const features = [ "🧠 AI-powered Emotion Insights", "📈 Mood Trend Visualization", "✍️ Daily Journaling", "🔐 Private & Secure", "🎨 Calming UI & Experience", "💬 Emotional Support from SereneAI", ]; const stats = [ { number: "10K+", label: "Journals Written" }, { number: "5K+", label: "Happy Users" }, { number: "99.9%", label: "Data Privacy" }, ]; const Home = () => { return (

))}

); }; export default Home;
